short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into a sleek, futuristic vibe with the Black Ironman Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring Tony Stark in an exclusive black armor design, this extension transforms your new tab into a marvel of innovation. Quickly access favorite websites with popular shortcuts, personalize with custom links, and stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Marvel at the stunning Black Ironman armor.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites with ease.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Customize your tab with links you use most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of time with an integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web effortlessly with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall quickly via the provided links.
